title: FREE ur 1ST 2 MONTHS - New Luxury Two-Bedroom Floorplans
posting_body: Welcome Home to Santa Rosa Oaks!
Move into one of our brand new luxury two-bedroom floorplans.
Santa Rosa Oaks
show contact info
1521 Range Ave
Santa Rosa CA 95401
Bed: 2
Bath: 1
Rent: 2500
Life in your Santa Rosa Oaks home also includes high-speed internet that you can easily control from your smart phone.
We can’t wait to meet you—contact us today!
Shop at Whole Foods, Macy’s, Target and many other specialty stores.

Our brand new two-bedroom floorplans feature gourmet kitchens with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops, in-unit washer and dryer, plank flooring, modern finishes and central heating and air.

Located minutes off Highway 101, within walking distance of the SMART Train, and only a short drive to Santa Rosa Junior College and Annadel State Park, Santa Rosa Oaks makes life more convenient and more fun!
Luxury living in the heart of Sonoma County - beautifully upgraded with luxe finishes.
Our Amenities
Microwave
Stainless Steel Appliances
Beautifully Landscaped
Central Heating & Air
Gas Range
Quartz Countertops
Washer & Dryer in unit
Recessed Lighting
High Speed Internet
In addition to our well appointed apartments, our best amenity is our location!
We’re just a half-mile down the street from Coddingtown Mall where enjoyment awaits.
Take a class at Orangetheory Fitness or Crunch Gym.
Grab a bite at  one of the many restaurants.
There’s even a spa, a nail salon and a beauty salon if you need a little pampering.
Or step across the street to enjoy beautiful Finali Park which features two playgrounds, a charming community garden and a spacious dog park.
Come home to a newly renovated community in the heart of Santa Rosa.
At Santa Rosa Oaks you won’t just be coming home, you’ll be coming home to a place you love.
Our community offers brand new, two bedroom floor plans with clean, modern finishes that perfectly compliment our bright, open spaces.
